1.0.name: wordpress/google-plus-badge
1.0.description:
Google Plus Badge - Google Plus Button with advanced slider (retioSlider). You can select some settings for slider like: 1. Box position ( left, right, top, bottom ), 1. Slider action ( hover, click ), 1. Open / close time ( in ms ) 1. Start / open / close opacity of Google Plus Badge box 1. Chose 1 of 15 unique icons.

Google Plus Badge require jQuery 1.4+
